casebody.data:
No. 09-10184. Allen Glenn Thomas, Petitioner v. Rick Thaler, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. 560 U.S. 962, 130 S. Ct. 3420,

177 L. Ed. 2d 321,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 4725. June 14, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
